titles.title: RAISE Act

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove from the list of drugs excluded from coverage under the Medicare prescription drug program prescription oral vitamins and mineral products indicated for the treatment of iron deficiency anemia in individuals with chronic kidney disease.
RAISE Act
Renal Anemia Innovation Support and Expansion Act

bill.summary:
Renal Anemia Innovation Support and Expansion Act or the RAISE Act
This bill allows coverage of prescription vitamin and mineral products under the Medicare prescription drug benefit if the products are administered orally and are used to treat iron deficiency anemia in individuals who have chronic kidney disease.
